EmailTemplate.name: Fundbox Auto Email
EmailTemplate.subject: We Found You a Great Financing Solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Here is the solution we were talking about earlier. Fundbox. https://fundbox.com/partner/getstarted/partnerships?utm_medium=partnership&utm_campaign=RapidAdvance
Getting your money with Fundbox is easy as 1 2 3.
Create an account using this unique link. Log which invoices you want paid now. Get funded.
Create My Account https://fundbox.com/partner/getstarted/partnerships?utm_medium=partnership&utm_campaign=RapidAdvance
​​​​​​Create your account today and you could get your funds as soon as tomorrow.
I'm confident this will be a great solution for you. Thanks again {!Contact.FirstName}!
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Title} RapidAdvance®
1001 Woodward Ave, Suite 1700 | Detroit, MI | 48226 Email:{!User.Email} | Website: www.RapidAdvance.com
